name: Freedom Hostels Rainbow Beach
description:
Our resort style hostel, has everything you need to relax, enjoy Rainbow Beach and make new friends. Enjoy the 2 outdoor pools, large common areas and onsite Cafe and bar. 

Freedom Rainbow Beach is the top destination for travellers going to and from Fraser Island. With all bus services dropping off and all tour companies picking up from right outside our door, you couldn't get a better location. 

Only a 6-minute walk to the beach and 25 minute walk to the beautiful Carlo Sand blow

•	FREE WiFi
•	FREE Luggage storage
•	Fully equipped communal kitchen and dining area
•	En-suite rooms
•	Laundry facilities
•	Licensed Bar
•	Communal TV with free Netflix

Our private and dorm rooms are more than just a place to rest your head. They’re your home away from home and our rooms have everything you need to chill out after a long day, hang out with friends, or plan your next adventure! So if you love sand, sun and sea, then Freedom Rainbow Beach is the place for you! 

T&C’s:

* Check-in is available from 2:00pm to 7:30pm, if you arrive after reception closes, we will send you the late check in details via email.

* Check-out is at 10am, a Luggage storage is available from 8am.

* Persons under the age of 18 are not permitted to stay at Freedom Rainbow without their parent or guardian.

* Guests staying in dormitory rooms must be aged 18-35.

* Accommodation must be paid in full at or prior to check-in. Bookings taken over the telephone will require payment of a deposit equal to one night’s accommodation for the booking.

* 24-hour cancellation policy: There is no cancellation fee for bookings cancelled at least 24 hours prior to check-in. Bookings cancelled less than 24 hours prior to check-in will be charged a cancellation fee equivalent to the cost of the first night’s accommodation.

* If you have made a reservation for more than one person in a dormitory room and you want to be allocated beds in the same room please make this request at the time of booking. 
If you do not make a request at time of your booking then we cannot guarantee that we will be able to accommodate the entire group in one room.

* All guests are required to present valid photo identification when checking-in. Freedom Rainbow will only accept a valid international Passport for international guests. Guests without valid photo ID will not be permitted to check-in.

* Freedom only accepts EFTPOS payments.

groupInformation.cancellationTerms: We require 7 days notice for cancellation, so all bookings that cancel within this time will recieve only 50% back, and within 48 hours they will recieve no refund at all.
groupInformation.additionalTerms: We Specialize in Fraser Island 4wd Camping Safari's, there is a discount with accomodation if a Fraser Island Trip is booked.
